summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: Hair Treatment Mask 120ml, 2019 PURC Magical Hair Mask, Deep Conditioner for Dry or Damaged Hair, 5 Seconds Repairs Damage Hair Root and Keratin Review Date: 2020/05/26 Store: GHEART Average Rating: 3.7 Product Details: {'Brand': 'GHEART', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Hair Type': 'Dull, Frizzy, Color Treated, Dry, Chemically Treated, Damaged', 'Product Benefits': 'Hydrating', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Package Dimensions': '2.8 x 2.8 x 1.9 inches; 5.61 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'Hair Treatment Mask-411', 'UPC': '778299243728'} Review Text: I bought two masks to try out. This one for dry and damaged hair and a keratin one. First, I want to say my hair is very damaged. The top of my hair seems oily but the bottom is super dry. I buy regular conditioner from just any store and they never detangle my hair. My niece told me I needed to try a "hair mask." I had never heard of it but she swears by it. So I decided to give it a try. You guys, it really works. You have to follow the directions though and put it on your hair longer than what the bottle says. The more damaged your hair is, the longer you should keep it on. I left mine on for a long while.. I cant even remember how long. I think maybe 30 minutes? Anyhow, when I washed it off, my hair actually was actually easier to comb through. I wish I could find conditioners like this though b/c I don't want to spend so much washing my hair! Review Title: leave on longer and it will be smoother Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: PARWIN BEAUTY Curling Wand 5 in 1 Curling Iron Set with 5 Interchangeable Ceramic Barrels 0.5” to 1.25” Hair Curling Wand Set, Rose Gold Review Date: 2020/07/21 Store: PARWIN PRO BEAUTY Average Rating: 4.2 Product Details: {'Brand': 'PARWIN PRO BEAUTY', 'Hair Type': 'All, Curly, Fine, Normal', 'Material': 'Ceramic', 'Size': '1 Count (Pack of 1)', 'Power Source': 'Corded Electric', 'Package Dimensions': '10.1 x 4.8 x 3.2 inches; 2.55 Pounds', 'UPC': '658709253601', 'Manufacturer': 'PARWIN BEAUTY'} Review Text: I returned this. Not worth it. was not as expected. Can't get a response Review Title: returned Rating: 1.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Mini Rubber Bands Soft Elastic Bands for Kids Hair Non-slip Rubber Hair Bands Soft Hair Elastics Ties Bands Braids Hair for Girls - STRONG - REUSEABLE (Colorful1000+Black1000) Review Date: 2020/08/11 Store: OLEWELL Average Rating: 3.7 Product Details: {'Material': 'Rubber', 'Item Form': 'Elastic', 'Brand': 'OLEWELL', 'Hair Type': 'Straight', 'Number of Pieces': '2', 'Package Dimensions': '7 x 5 x 1 inches; 0.81 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'SML'} Review Text: I for these to use for the ends of my side ponytail. When I use my regular bands. They are just too big and bulky and they tangle up.

So good thing about these are:
- they do not tangle my hair
- they stretch a bit but not too much
- they give you a ton of them so you don’t feel bad losing them

Con:
- they break fairly easy Review Title: Breaks fairly easy but you can plenty of them Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: LANGE HAIR Extendé Conditioning Detangler Hair Spray - Paraben Free Leave-in Conditioner Spray, Detangles and Hydrates Hair, Moisture & Shine | 4OZ Review Date: 2020/08/15 Average Rating: 4.2 Product Details: {'Item Form': 'Liquid', 'Material Feature': 'Paraben Free', 'Hair Type': 'Curly, Dry', 'Product Benefits': 'Helps protect color and reinforces strands, leaving them strong and vibrant', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Package Dimensions': '6.5 x 1.4 x 1.4 inches; 4 Ounces', 'UPC': '793150592708'} Review Text: I have the worst tangled hair ever from all the highlights and dying it I've done over the last 15 years. My hair is so damaged. And also because it is so long, it's almost impossible to manager. I also have a TON of hair. When I go to the salon, they usually have two people blow drying my hair. Anyhow, I have a detanger brush, I've bought hair mask, I've used leave in conditioner, and I've used different detanglers. (I've done the it's the 10 product also). I have to say I was very impressed with this bottle. Right off when I sprayed it, I noticed it came out different. It wasn't a spray, it was more of a mist spray so it sprayed more powerfully but evenly and wide. I used it right after I showered and towel dried my hair and then sprayed it and brushed. And it worked. i was able to detangle my hair. The only thing I wish was that this bottle was bigger. It's pretty small! Review Title: detangled my highlighted 15 year damaged hair Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: JMOSTRG 4.2V Mini Battery Box Kit (Color) Review Date: 2020/09/17 Store: JMOSTRG Average Rating: 5.0 Product Details: {'Package Dimensions': '5 x 3.7 x 3.31 inches; 8.47 Ounces', 'UPC': '190731969162'} Review Text: This is so cute and perfect! This will encourage kids to carry around their hand sanitizer and you can keep refilling it and save money! Definitely worth it. Review Title: perfect to encourage kids to use hand sanitizer Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Travel Bottles for Toiletries, Silicone Travel Size Bottles And Squeezable Containers Holders with belt clip Keychain for Backpack, Shampoo, Liquid, Cosmetic Products(2 oz, 6 Pack) Review Date: 2020/11/17 Store: MACRAY Average Rating: 4.1 Product Details: {'Brand': 'MACRAY', 'Material': 'Silicone', 'Capacity': '2 Ounces', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Package Dimensions': '11.73 x 6.61 x 1.61 inches; 8.47 Ounces', 'UPC': '782938308006'} Review Text: I customized and added vinyl stickers to it with teachers name and it was huge hit at the school! Now everyone has their own sanitizer clip to their pants! Super handy and definitely needed at this time. Review Title: Perfect gift at this time Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Caudalie Vinosource SOS Intense Hydration Set: Hydrating Trio for Sensitive Skin including a Daily Foam Cleanser, Hydrating Serum, Facial Moisturizer Review Date: 2020/11/18 Average Rating: 4.7 Product Details: {'Package Dimensions': '6.93 x 5.35 x 2.64 inches; 14.5 Ounces'} Review Text: I originally got this thinking I’ll give it as a gift. But I ended up keeping it for myself!! The moisturizer is so nice. In the cold season, I have real bad dry skin on my face. Ira horrible. Or gets flaky at this. I have used some moisturizer that felt too thin (but great for summer). It seemed like it was doing a good job then then the flakes came right back so it was very surface and didn’t penetrate. Then I’ve had very thick moisturizer like the one you use at night. The problem with this is sometimes it made like little balls. I’m not sure how to describe it but it kind of made a layer and then peeled off. So I needed something in between. This wa a perfect. It is actually thick but liquidy. In other words it is very moisturizing. After you put it on, you need to let it soak in and dry a little. But it works great. Normally I have combo skin. I use deep moisturizer only in the winter. Review Title: Not too thick and not too thin Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Natwag Makeup Remover Pads,18 Pack 3.74 Inch Reusable Microfiber Cleansing Pad with Laundry Bag Suitable for All Skin Types,3 Color Facial Cleansing Pad Set. Review Date: 2020/11/19 Store: Natwag Average Rating: 4.6 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Natwag', 'Skin Type': 'All Skin,Dry', 'Material Feature': 'Reusable', 'Unit Count': '18.00 Count', 'Number of Items': '18', 'Package Dimensions': '4.4 x 4.37 x 2.59 inches; 3.84 Ounces', 'UPC': '745103569701'} Review Text: These pads are very soft. So I do like that about the pads. However, they are also thin. My concern is that I'm not sure how often I can use them. The good thing also is that you get a lot. So I don't think it really is intended to be used indefinitely. I love these to bring to travel. They are small and super handy. I used to bring some face wipes but I find that those dont actually take off all your makeup! I was watching a tutorial in which they said to actually used different type of remover so you would need a cloth. So this is ideal. Also it saves from wash if you use a cotton wipe instead! Review Title: soft, great for travel, and good for environment Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: C'est Moi Gentle Cleansing Water | Gentle, Fragrance-Free Cleanser Removes Makeup and Refreshes Skin, Made with Cornflower Water, Aloe Vera, and Strawberry, Kiwi, and Apple Extracts | 5.9 fl oz. Review Date: 2020/11/25 Store: C'est Moi Average Rating: 4.4 Product Details: {'Item Form': 'Liquid', 'Skin Type': 'Acne Prone,Sensitive', 'Brand': "C'est Moi", 'Scent': 'Kiwi, Strawberry, Unscented, Aloe Vera', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Product Dimensions': '1.84 x 1.84 x 6.06 inches; 7.69 Ounces', 'UPC': '039897626055'} Review Text: I love that this product is make of a bunch of natural items. I've been concern lately of these items with ingredients that are bad for us and we don't even know! So I dont actually use this alone. I use a makeup remover wipe first and then I use this also to catch what is left. What i noticed is that this isn't the type of remover where you just used it and then can walk away. You do have to use water to clean off your face after. I also have sensitive skin and I will say it did not irritate my skin at all. I didn't think it had any smell to it really. I do like it but I wouldn't give it a full 5 star because of the fact that you do have to do an extra step to be clean after. Review Title: removes makeup well but have to wash aftewards Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: [the SAEM] Derma Plan Cleansing Bubble Pad 15pcs - One Step Gentle Makeup Cleansing Wipes Produce Fine & Dense Bubbles, Hypoallergenic Formula, Pore Clean, Mild Exfoliation Review Date: 2020/11/25 Store: THESAEM Average Rating: 3.6 Product Details: {'Brand': 'THESAEM', 'Skin Type': 'Sensitive', 'Unit Count': '15.00 Count', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Package Dimensions': '3.9 x 3.9 x 1.8 inches; 3.21 Ounces'} Review Text: Overall, this is a pretty fair item depending on your need. For a daily item, this would not rank high for me (due to the cons listed below). However, for traveling, this is amazing as it comes dry and is in a convenient container. You can take it anywhere easily.

Pros:
- I like the packaging but wonder if this made it more dry?
- the size is nice to travel with and convenient
- it is refreshing
- theres a hole where you put your finger in to use it so that was really neat

Cons:
- is thin
- instructions are not in english
- not enough pads in the container
- you have to wet it first to use it and it does get kind of messy Review Title: great for travel but not for every day use Rating: 4.0 --------------------------------------------------

prompt:
Based on this purchase history, analyze and summarize this person's genuine preferences and patterns in under 256 words. Think step by step: 1. First, identify consistent patterns in ratings and sentiments 2. Next, observe common themes across product purposes and use cases 3. Then, note recurring quality preferences and price sensitivity patterns 4. Finally, synthesize these observations into core preferences Remember to: - Focus only on keywords and trends supported by multiple interactions - Avoid repeating specific product names or details - Base conclusions strictly on the provided purchase data Here's the purchase data: === Purchase Information === Product Title: Hair Treatment Mask 120ml, 2019 PURC Magical Hair Mask, Deep Conditioner for Dry or Damaged Hair, 5 Seconds Repairs Damage Hair Root and Keratin Review Date: 2020/05/26 Store: GHEART Average Rating: 3.7 Product Details: {'Brand': 'GHEART', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Hair Type': 'Dull, Frizzy, Color Treated, Dry, Chemically Treated, Damaged', 'Product Benefits': 'Hydrating', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Package Dimensions': '2.8 x 2.8 x 1.9 inches; 5.61 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'Hair Treatment Mask-411', 'UPC': '778299243728'} Review Text: I bought two masks to try out. This one for dry and damaged hair and a keratin one. First, I want to say my hair is very damaged. The top of my hair seems oily but the bottom is super dry. So I do like that about the pads. However, they are also thin. My concern is that I'm not sure how often I can use them. The good thing also is that you get a lot. So I don't think it really is intended to be used indefinitely. I love these to bring to travel. They are small and super handy. I used to bring some face wipes but I find that those dont actually take off all your makeup! I was watching a tutorial in which they said to actually used different type of remover so you would need a cloth. So this is ideal. Also it saves from wash if you use a cotton wipe instead! Review Title: soft, great for travel, and good for environment Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: C'est Moi Gentle Cleansing Water | Gentle, Fragrance-Free Cleanser Removes Makeup and Refreshes Skin, Made with Cornflower Water, Aloe Vera, and Strawberry, Kiwi, and Apple Extracts | 5.9 fl oz. Review Date: 2020/11/25 Store: C'est Moi Average Rating: 4.4 Product Details: {'Item Form': 'Liquid', 'Skin Type': 'Acne Prone,Sensitive', 'Brand': "C'est Moi", 'Scent': 'Kiwi, Strawberry, Unscented, Aloe Vera', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Product Dimensions': '1.84 x 1.84 x 6.06 inches; 7.69 Ounces', 'UPC': '039897626055'} Review Text: I love that this product is make of a bunch of natural items. I've been concern lately of these items with ingredients that are bad for us and we don't even know! So I dont actually use this alone. I use a makeup remover wipe first and then I use this also to catch what is left. What i noticed is that this isn't the type of remover where you just used it and then can walk away. You do have to use water to clean off your face after. I also have sensitive skin and I will say it did not irritate my skin at all. I didn't think it had any smell to it really. I do like it but I wouldn't give it a full 5 star because of the fact that you do have to do an extra step to be clean after. Review Title: removes makeup well but have to wash aftewards Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: [the SAEM] Derma Plan Cleansing Bubble Pad 15pcs - One Step Gentle Makeup Cleansing Wipes Produce Fine & Dense Bubbles, Hypoallergenic Formula, Pore Clean, Mild Exfoliation Review Date: 2020/11/25 Store: THESAEM Average Rating: 3.6 Product Details: {'Brand': 'THESAEM', 'Skin Type': 'Sensitive', 'Unit Count': '15.00 Count', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Package Dimensions': '3.9 x 3.9 x 1.8 inches; 3.21 Ounces'} Review Text: Overall, this is a pretty fair item depending on your need. For a daily item, this would not rank high for me (due to the cons listed below). However, for traveling, this is amazing as it comes dry and is in a convenient container. You can take it anywhere easily.

Pros:
- I like the packaging but wonder if this made it more dry?
- the size is nice to travel with and convenient
- it is refreshing
- theres a hole where you put your finger in to use it so that was really neat

Cons:
- is thin
- instructions are not in english
- not enough pads in the container
- you have to wet it first to use it and it does get kind of messy Review Title: great for travel but not for every day use Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- Structure your response as: SUMMARY: [Final synthesis of preferences and patterns]
raw_response:
**SUMMARY:**

The purchase data reveals a strong preference for hair care products, especially those that address damage and tangling. This individual prioritizes effectiveness, as evidenced by the high ratings for products that provide hydration and detangling benefits, particularly for colored or damaged hair. A notable pattern is the willingness to invest time and effort into hair treatment processes, with recommendations to leave products on longer indicating a commitment to achieving optimal results.

In terms of product types, the buyer shows interest in multifunctional items such as detanglers and deep conditioners that serve dual purposes (hydration and damage repair). There is a recurring theme of seeking convenience and practicality, illustrated by the purchase of mini elastic bands for easier hairstyles and travel-friendly containers for personal care products.

Quality is critical; the customer exhibits higher satisfaction with well-reviewed, effective products, despite expressing price sensitivity, shown by frustration over product disappointments and returns related to perceived value. 

Overall, the core preferences are for effective, high-quality hair care solutions that cater to specific needs (hydration and damage repair), alongside practical, multifunctional products that are travel-friendly and convenient for daily use.

target_interaction.title: cannot be alone done
target_interaction.text: I have an aunt in another state who is a hair dresser. Years ago, she asked me if I wanted to perm my lashes when she came down to visit. I thought she was crazy! This was like 10 years ago. I never heard of such a thing and I didn't do it. Well I don't know what happened recently for this to suddenly now become popular. One of my friends and I were talking about lash extensions and lattisse. I was telling her how my eye lids turn red when i try to use lattisse. I even tried the RF brand and same thing! Anyhows, then i've been doing exentions for about a year now but I am finding that my lash is getting worst and worst.. like when my extensions fall out, I barely have lashes! I used to have average lash that  I could curl. But now it seems like I barely have anything. So this is why I decided to finally consider perming my lash. So perming the did not make it longer by any means! What it did though is made it look like I had lashes that were longer but it curved up! My lash tends to grow straight. It may have have to do with the fact that I have asian eyes. So the curling has always been important when I used to wear mascara. The thing is I hate that sometimes it poked at me and the curler would yank some lashes out!  Also I just hate it doing it every day. With perm lashes, you don't have to do this. However, I don't know if I could have done this alone. I had to get a friend to help me. She said it was pretty easy. What took the longest is us reading things over and over to make sure we weren't going to make me blind! I think it took about an hour or so? I can't recall exactly as we didn't time it.  The reason I am giving it 4 stars is that you really cannot do this by yourself.  Now it may not look drastic to most people bc they don't usually notice your lashes. But you would b/c you know how they look before. Then add mascara and you can definitely tell.
target_interaction.title_meta: Lash Lift Kit -Buqikma Eyelash Perm Kit Lash Curling Set Semi-Permanent Lifting Perming Wave for Salon and Personal Use (Glue Upgraded Version)
